descriptor.name: Screen Gel Creme(100gm)
descriptor.short_desc: Gold Facial Kit: Gold – this precious yellow metal has been well loved by women over centuries. The anti-aging benefits of gold can be traced back 5,000 years to Cleopatra, who was said to sleep in a ...
descriptor.long_desc:
Gold Facial Kit: Gold – this precious yellow metal has been well loved by women over centuries. The anti-aging benefits of gold can be traced back 5,000 years to Cleopatra, who was said to sleep in a gold face mask every night to enhance the suppleness of her complexion and preserve its natural luminosity. Recognizing its popularity and skin-enriching qualities, VLCC has harnessed the best benefits of the metal to curate this luxurious facial that improves skin’s hydration and metabolism, prevents premature aging, removes pigmentation, age spots, lines and wrinkles, boosts collagen regeneration, and strengthens elastin fibres to reveal radiant, luminous, youthful complexion.
De-Tan SPF 50 PA+++ Sun Screen Gel Crème is a unique formulation, enriched with Carrot & Cucumber extracts, which delivers a powerful de-tanning action while protecting your skin from sun’s harmful UVA & UVB Rays. It effectively fades tan revealing brighter skin tone, helps fade dark patches leaving skin looking even, radiant & moisturised.

descriptor.name: VLCC Vitamin C Foaming Facewash (100 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: VLCC De Tan + Anti Tan Sunscreen Gel Crème SPF 40 has a unique sun protection formula that also provides dual benefits of Detan and Anti tan.De Tan Benefit: Enriched with Saxifraga Extract, Morbus Bom...
descriptor.long_desc: VLCC De Tan + Anti Tan Sunscreen Gel Crème SPF 40 has a unique sun protection formula that also provides dual benefits of Detan and Anti tan.De Tan Benefit: Enriched with Saxifraga Extract, Morbus Bombycis Extract, Vitamin B3 & AHA, it de tans the skin by removing existing tanning, helps in depigmentation and fading away of dark spots.Anti Tan Benefit: Tyrosinase present in the skin increases the melanin formation when exposed to sun rays, this causes tanning. The Kojic Dipalmitate present in the formulation inhibits Tyrosinase activity thereby prevents further tanning.Key Features:1. Boots star authenticated four star superior protection from sun rays2. Broad spectrum protection from both UVA & UVB rays.3. Paraben-free formulation

descriptor.name: VLCC Almond Honey Deep Nourishing & Skin Brightening Body Lotion (Buy 1 Get 1)(Each 350ml)
descriptor.short_desc: Soy Extract is an excellent source of high-quality protein (compared to some other protein sources) that can help you build lean muscle mass. Plus, soy protein provides a good source of energy from ca...
descriptor.long_desc: Soy Extract is an excellent source of high-quality protein (compared to some other protein sources) that can help you build lean muscle mass. Plus, soy protein provides a good source of energy from calories and branched-chain amino acids. When combined with exercise and a healthy diet, soy protein makes an excellent “partner” in a successful diet plan. For fighting fat, you just can’t beat soybeans for their versatility. Though surprisingly high in fat for a bean, it’s mostly the healthy unsaturated kind. A significant number of research studies support claims that soy protein can help you lose weight. Infused with the goodness of Soy Protein, the VLCC Waist and Tummy Trim Gel gets absorbed quickly and helps you achieve a slimmer, toned and firm waist and tummy.
